nodes.text: Trenwyth was a world located in the Mid Rim that was the homeworld of flesh-eating daggerworms, a species of parasitic worm that could infest happabores.

Trenwyth first appeared in the comic book Star Wars 103, which was written by Mary Jo Duffy, illustrated by Cynthia Martin and published in 1985. The location was confirmed to be canon by the replica journal Rey's Survival Guide, which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2015.
